organic.title: Link a platform account to your CAPCOM ID in-game
organic.snippet: Guide for linking/pairing your account from a game screen. We will explain how to link/pair your CAPCOM ID with your Platform Account from a game screen.

organic.title: Download Chips (MMBN 3) | Mega Man Battle Network ...
organic.snippet: Top; Mega Man Battle Network 3. Download Chips. You can get special Battle Chips for each game that were previously given out through events and other means. Press on the MegaMan screen to open the Download Chip screen. Select and confirm the Chip that you would like and it will be sent to your Pack.

organic.title: Patch Cards and Download Chips | Mega Man Battle ...
organic.snippet: Press on the MegaMan screen to open the Download Chip and Patch Card screen. Select and confirm the desired Download Chip to acquire the shown Chip, and do the same for Patch Cards to load their effect into the game. Each Download Chip can only be loaded once, but Patch Cards can be loaded again and again. Patch ...

organic.title: How to Link/Pair your Platform Account
organic.snippet: CAPCOM ID is a single unified account that can be used to manage various Capcom games and web services. Anyone can sign up to create an account and start using it for free. Platform Account Link/Pair.

organic.title: Capcom USA > Games
organic.snippet: Choose Platform, All, Android, Apple iOS, Luna, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Steam, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S.

organic.title: Support

organic.title: Online Play with CAPCOM ID
organic.snippet: CAPCOM ID is a single unified account that can be used to manage various Capcom games and web services. Anyone can sign up to create an account and start using it for free. Platform Account Link/Pair.

organic.title: Cross-platform Play
organic.snippet: This game supports cross-platform multiplayer. Cross-platform play can be turned on or off via the Cross-platform Play setting in the Options menu.
